June 11, 2017 D Newtown Open Air Contest
Newtown Open Air Contest 0 Other
newtown-open-air-contest
None
Other
Newtown, Powys, Wales, UK March, hymn and one entertainment piece
Open to nationally graded First, Second, Third and Fourth section bands, non-registered bands, and youth and training bands
Open deportment prize: Porthaethwy Menai Bridge Youth/training deportment prize: Newtown Training Soloist award: Flugel, Wellington (Telford) Best bass section: Porthaethwy Menai Bridge Youngest brass player: Rose Foskett, Newtown Training Youngest percussion player: Evans Haine, North Powys Training Best march: Ifton Colliery Best hymn tune: Porthaethwy Menai Bridge Highest placed youth band: Seindorf Ieuenctid Deiniolen Highest placed training band: North Powys Training Runner-up training band: Newtown Training
